description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

notes: 原郭肇中老師，4/8起改由蘇昭瑾老師授課

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

notes: 第9周起，改由吳可久老師授課。

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 日職建都所及設計博合開

description.zh: 在《電影》(一九二六) 一文裡，維吉尼亞o吳爾芙曾說：文學作品與其改編電影的關係，就如不幸的受害者與貪婪的掠奪者或寄生蟲之間的關係一般。電影業已經建立了一項傳統，將文學作品作為滋養其文化與美學內涵的材料來源。然而，對吳爾芙而言，這種傳統卻為電影業與文學作品帶來了災難性的結果。如她所言：「正當眼睛與大腦欲攜手合作卻徒勞無功之際，他們同時亦遭受到無情地剝離。」儘管吳爾芙也許對於文學作品與其改編電影的關係過於悲觀，然而，她的話有時聽來卻也千真萬確。在本課程裡，我們將探討改編自文學作品的電影之局限和缺點，以及其潛力和長處等問題。我們將研究，在文學作品之中得依賴讀者想像力才能生動傳達的微妙心理，電影裡的聲音與視覺效果須如何將之傳遞?文學與電影在處理象徵及思想的方法上，有何不同?還有，改編自文學作品的電影如何偏離文學原作之主題或結構，以便迎合當代觀眾之美學、心理、社會、政治、以及文化等層面的期待？本課程將研究之文學作品與改編電影將於下列作品中選出，但是不局限於下列作品：Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness (1899)Francis Ford Coppola, Apocalypse Now (1979)Rudyard Kipling, Kim (1901)John Howard Davie
description.en: In "The Cinema" (1926), Virginia Woolf observes that the relationship between works of literature and their film adaptations is like that between unfortunate victims and their rapacious predators or parasites. The cinema has established a tradition of feeding on works of literature as a source of cultural and aesthetic nourishment. But the results for her are "disastrous to both." As she puts it, "Eye and brain are torn asunder ruthlessly as they try vainly to work in couples." Although Woolf might have been over pessimistic about the alliance between works of literature and film adaptations, yet her words ring true at times. In this course, we will explore the limitations and shortcomings as well as the potentialities and strengths of the film adaptations of literary works. We will examine how cinematic sound and visual effects convey psychological subtleties, whose rendition in literature relies heavily on words that come alive only in our imagination; how symbols and thoughts are tr

name.zh: 經典文學作品創意教學

description.zh: 本課程主旨在向各級學校的英語師資，或對西洋文學文化有興趣的社會人士，推薦英美文學經典作品作為創意教學的教材藍本，兼具創意教學此一領域的理論介紹與創作實務。學員們藉由對英美經典文學作品與其相關之多媒體文化產物的研讀和探索，激起反應、反省與靈感，進而以英文創作作為回饋，朝向創意產業邁進。本課程設計的目標在激發學員多方面的能力：（1）瞭解英美經典文學作品的文字之美與文化意涵、（2）用英語表達的習慣、（3）用英文創作的潛能、以及（4）進入英語文化創意產業的準備。
description.en: This course introduces English literary cannons as the basis for teaching creativity and the related theories and practices. Students will be exploring a series of multimedia and cultural products created based on English literary cannons and in terms creating their own works. Students of this course are expected to develop in these four aspects: 1. Understanding English literary cannons and their cultural implications; 2. Expressing oneself well in the English language; 3. Creating in the English language; 4. Equipping for the English cultural and literary creative industry.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。 1. 瞭解組織所處環境 2. 分析外部環境之時機和危機 3. 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 4. 探討企業不同層次之應對策略。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one. Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions. We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究(一)

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F教室；選課人數上限10人

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Statistics for environmental engineers & experimental design

description.zh: 本課程之目的，在於利用統計學之理論及方式，處理及分析環境領域實驗數據，含基本理論、線性迴歸等。並進一步利用此原理，作實驗中參數簡化對實驗結果之影響，並討論簡化後其參數「相關性」（intercorrelation）之問題，期以最短之實驗時間，得到最佳之實驗效果 本課程之主要講述大綱為1.基本統計學原理及統計學在環境領域之應用2.迴歸分析及統計軟體應用3.模廠實驗之參數及其變化（level）之選擇4.	階乘實驗設計（Factorial design at two levels）5.階乘實驗設計之簡化（Fractional Factorial design at two levels）6.分析階乘實驗設計之結果（Analysis of half-fraction design）
description.en: The goals of this class are to utilize the methodology of the statistics to analyze the data generated in environmental area.  In addition, basic ideas of experimental design with applications, completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments and determination of optimum factor combinations are also discussed in this class.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 1.實體模型設計簡介與應用2.實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.鈑金零件9.熔接10.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖)11.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源)12.輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹歐盟專利法規，課程重點將以歐盟專利公約為主，並將包含歐州專利局的上訴委員會的案例。此外，相關歐盟會員國的專利案件也將於本課程中介紹。本課程每週將指定閱讀教材，修習本課同學，須先自行研讀，並參與每週課堂中的討論。
description.en: The course will provide an introductory overview of the regulations of European patents. The emphasis will be on the substantive law under the European Patent Convention, including the jurisprudence of the EPO Board of Appeals. In addition, relevant cases decided by members of EPC will be addressed.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (II)

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and appro92hes, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現應用於設計的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究，研究工具，與研究方法，並討論與人互動之設計領域研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計，與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the recent developments on digital representations and their applications on design. Theoretically, this course reviews the theories and methodologies of the research applications in the field of design that involves human interaction.

notes: 請排光華409室,上限5人,日職合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 請排進修部教室,修課上限30人,日職合開

name.zh: 整合經營策略個案分析
name.en: Integrated Business and Strategy Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，主要以策略管理與營運模式為核心，在每個個案討論當中，同時由策略管理、人力資源管理、組織管理、服務管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生從策略的角度，學習這些管理功能的整合與營運模式，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Strategy Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Strategy, HRM, Organization Management, and service Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，本課程也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避孼心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect individuals’ decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc. In addition, this course is also to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets.

name.en: The Leadership Philosophy of Senior Manager

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階主管的領導理論與實務。課程目的有三個：(1)了解高階主管的領導與管理；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界高階主管提供具體建議。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of senior manager’s leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is (especially for the senior managers); (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for senior managers’ leadership.

description.zh: 面對國際多元化人文地理與異質性的市場需求，如何研究與發展有效地國際市場行銷策略與管理為本課程的主要目標。學生將學習國際企業面對經營環境變化，如何成功地進入國際市場，進而展開國際市場行銷策略與活動，建構企業競爭優勢，創造卓越經營績效。本課程透過有系統地介紹國際企業、國際環境、國際市場進入策略、國際市場行銷策略與行銷組合決策等，並利用案例分析將學術理論與管理實務作連結，訓練學生發展從事國際市場行銷的知識與方法，期望使學生深入瞭解國際市場情形，並具備規劃與執行國際市場行銷策略的能力。
description.en: Facing international diversified geography and heterogeneity demand，the main goal of this course is how to study and develop effective international marketing strategy and management. Students will learn that how international companies, in the changing business environment, successfully enter the international market, and then expand the international marketing strategy and activities, construct competitive advantage, and create excellence business performance. The course through the systematic introduction of international business, international environment, international market entry strategies, international marketing strategy and marketing mix decisions, etc., and the use of case studies to academic theory and management practices for the link, trains students to develop knowledge in the international marketing of and methods, This course is expected to enable students to understand the international market situation, and allows students to have the ability to plan and implement

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

notes: 碩一108級必修 (北科附工304室)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構。將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

name.zh: 大數據與人工智能應用系統設計
name.en: Big Data and Artificial Intelligence Application System Design

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)提供之雲端開發框架，以設計大數據與人工智能應用系統。課程內容包括：資料擷取、轉換與儲存流程，資料建模、探勘與分析技術，語音、文字、影像等機器學習演算法設計，氣象、交通、互聯網、零售、金融與製造等領域人工智能應用系統開發案例。藉由實務個案教學及期末專題設計，讓學生掌握大數據分析方法，並能運用軟體工程技術，設計人工智能應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design big data and artificial intelligence application systems using GCP (Google Cloud Platform) or AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services.  Course spans a variety of big data processing technologies such as capturing data, data transfer, data storage, data analysis, model assessments, machine learning algorithms, and business application systems for artificial intelligence.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in big data analytics and artificial intelligence system design.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Semiconductor Materials.

description.zh: 1. 概論2. 鐵路變電所設計3. 電力遙控系統4. 電車線系統設計5. 干擾與防護6. 動力車的電力供應7. 動力車的電力控制8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

notes: 電機所和IEECS合開,綜科4樓思源講堂

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換2.         機械手臂運動學3.         機械手臂反向運動學4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力5.         機械手臂動力學6.         軌跡規劃7.         機械手臂控制8.         機器視覺9.         工業自動化應用10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

notes: *電機所、自動化所、IEECS和機械自動化班合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程為ㄧ跨文化、跨領域及跨國界的實務導向課程。課程結構涵蓋二個主軸：(1)透過分組討論議題與任務指派，學習團隊合作，從領導力到團隊成員之間的溝通，確認每個成員的角色定位，建立高績效團隊；(2)透過宏觀的金融分析以及時事的案例研討，判斷國際市場趨勢，並透過市場上真實的投資工具模擬，逐步帶領學生從基本面、技術面進行國際市場的行情分析以及個人的風險控管。
description.en: This course is a practical international Economic course.There are two main parts of the lecture.The first one is team building, you will learn how to divide the work and communicate effectively.The second part is learning by doing. The teacher will analysis the trend of the international market by macroeconomics. Moreover, teaching students using technical and fundamental analysis to predict the market. Most important of all, let students use the online application to imitate the real trading world.

description.zh: 1. 並行計算之重要基本系統概念2. 複行程與複執行線程式設計基礎3. 競爭情況、臨界區段、與同步4. 互斥之純軟體、純硬體解法與證明技法5. 同步基本機制(含訊號機制、互斥鎖、Hoare和Mesa類型監督程式、基礎訊息傳遞)6. 死結與活結7. 程式語言與函式庫簡介
description.en: 1.	Basic systems concepts important to concurrent computing2.	Multi-process and multithreaded programming basics3.	Race conditions, critical sections, and synchronization4.	Pure software and hardware solutions and proof techniques for mutual exclusion5.	Synchronization primitives (i.e., semaphores, mutex locks, monitors of Hoare and Mesa types, basic message passing)6.	Deadlocks and livelocks7.	Survey of some languages (e.g., Java and Ada) and libraries (e.g., Pthreads)

notes: 英授、資工三四合開、業師密西根理工大學冼鏡光教授

name.zh: 語言教學趨勢專題研討
name.en: Seminar on ELT Trends and Issues

description.zh: 本課程將對英語文教學之趨勢與議題進行深入探討與分析，課程內容包含一般英語文(EGP)及專業英語文(ESP)之教學法、課程設計與英語教學實踐研究、全英語授課(EMI)、學科內容與語言整合教學(CLIL)、雙語教育及師資培育等相關議題。本課程在培養學生具有英語文教學與研究之理論基礎、研究設計及創新課程推動之應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of current and emerging issues and trends in English as a foreign language (EFL) teaching and research. Both teaching English for general purposes (EGP) and specific purposes (ESP) will be addressed regarding methods and techniques in implementing courses and teaching practice research. The issues related to bilingual education will also be discussed, including English as a medium of instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL), and bilingual teacher development. The course will provide theoretical foundations and applications in respect to research and innovations in teaching EFL across different education levels.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹關於語言、社會與權力之間關連性的基本理論與重要議題。本課程將探討語言如何在社會中運作；媒體、政治與日常生活的語言使用；不同世代、種族、階級與性別語言使用的差異；語言如何影響思考；語言如何影響與建構我們的認同。
description.en: This course introduces students to fundamental theories and key issues about connections between language, society, and power. It examines how language functions in society; language use in the media, politics and everyday talk; differences in language according to age, ethnicity, class, and gender; how it influences thought; and how it affects and constructs our identities. Through readings and class discussion, this course provides students with theoretical ideas and analytical strategies to their research projects.

name.en: Study of Design Thoughts and Movements

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 本課程適合所有對於如何向自然取經的創新設計策略有興趣的學生。學生將探索這個將功能、性能和美學從生物學轉換成科技的過程，及如何增進設計創造力和產生比傳統技術更好的解決方案，包括講授從原始科學突破到創業初創企業的仿生設計過程，從壁虎式粘合劑到可跑步、飛行和游泳的機器人等案例分析，以及跨領域學生團隊合作進行原創的生物啟發設計專題。
description.en: Bioinspired design views the process of how we learn from Nature as an innovation strategy translating principles of function, performance and aesthetics from biology to human technology. This course gives an overview of how bioinspired design can lead to more design creativity and to better solutions than with conventional technology. Lectures will address the biomimicry design process from original scientific breakthroughs to entrepreneurial start-ups using cases studies that include gecko-inspired adhesives and robots that run, fly and swim, Interdisciplinary teams of students will collaborate on, create, and present original bioinspired design projects.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(二)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(II)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

name.zh: 兒童發展及遊戲介入研究

description.zh: 本課程主要評估兒童互動產品是否能夠合乎教育與互動上的設計考量 - 無論是玩具，遊戲，教育產品還是網站 - 都能夠合理且有效的達到教學與娛樂上的需求。課程中提供了兒童發展和兒童心理學的基本背景，特別是與技術相關的理論背景; 幫助學生針對孩童進行互動設計研究與評估觀察，訓練學生或是研究者透過不同的科技工具，例如使用不同的錄像視頻技術去觀察兒童使用經驗與互動上的方法，去審視兒童產品設計與研究工作相關上的準則與研究參考。
description.en: Evaluating Children's Interactive Products directly addresses the need to ensure that interactive products designed for children — whether toys, games, educational products, or websites — are safe, effective, and entertaining. It presents an essential background in child development and child psychology, particularly as they relate to technology; captures best practices for observing and surveying children, training evaluators, and capturing the child user experience using audio and visual technology; and examines ethical and legal issues involved in working with children and offers guidelines for effective risk management.

description.zh: 1. 類神經網路簡介2. 淺層類神經網路3. 深層類神經網路4. 遞歸類神經網路5. 長短期記憶類神經網路6. 卷積類神經網路7. 深度強化學習
description.en: 1. Introduction to Neural Networks2. Shallow Neural Networks3. Deep Neural Networks4. Recurrent Neural Networks5. Long Short-term Memory Neural Networks6. Convolutional Neural Networks7. Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.en: Analysis and Decision Making Using Data

description.zh: 一個數據模式是可以用來解釋結構性資料在商業環境下所代表的意義，而數據模組的建立，則是現實世界知訊管理系統中的自然而然產生的普遍結果。上述共同構成了我們當今被稱為數據分析系統，此系統是一種管理工具，提供用於評估及製定決策。本課程旨在介紹基礎數據模組的工具和使用方法以及相關主題，並會包含與強調在商業上的應用，其重點在不確定性模組建立與評估，理解決策的本質，有效利用數據和有限的信息來模擬複雜系統以及優化分配資源。
description.en: A data model describes how structured data is represented in a business environment. Data modeling is a natural consequence of the prevalence of management information systems in the real world. Together they form what in our days has become known as a Data Analytics system that provides management tools to evaluate performance and make decisions. The course aims to introduce the fundamentals of data models tools and methods and related topics. Business applications of the topics covered will be highlighted. The emphasis will be on modeling and evaluating uncertainty, understanding the nature of decision-making, using data and limited information efficiently simulating complex systems, and optimally allocating resources.

description.zh: 科技創新引領商業生態進入了智慧時代；敏捷的企業發展應以產業發展和全球經濟趨勢並重。學生將在此研討課中汲取國際商管知識，增進新興科技創新發展趨勢，以及探討企業商業策略的理念和實務個案。
description.en: The rapid development of technology innovation drives the business ecosystem into the era of including the information of intelligence and enterprises simultaneously. At the same time, the adoption of industrial trend and global economy trend has to be on the agile enterprises basis. In this course, students will gain knowledge on international business management, especially the trend and demand of emerging technological innovation.  Both theories and practical cases on business strategic development will be included in the course.

description.zh: 數據科學是基於數據並由數據驅動的一門科學範疇,雖然自有科學以來,實證研究莫不仰賴數據作為基礎,但是卻從沒有一個時代像如今數據的產生如此巨量、數據的傳輸如此快速、數據的儲存價格如此低廉和數據的分析能力如此強大,因此數據科學已經成為一個新的典範,並成為維基百科所引述的:「數據科學是一個整合統計、數據分析、機器學習及其相關方法的概念,以便用數據理解和分析實際現象」(原始出處見https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_science)。為提供學生關於數據科學的概觀和練習,在這門概論課程中,我們將介紹數據科學的眾多面向,並利用電腦軟體來探討數據的儲存、彙整、梳理、取樣、建模、探勘、視覺化、統計分析和機器學習等課題。
description.en: Data science is a field of science that is based on data and driven by data. Although evidence-based scientific research has always relied on data as its foundation, there has never been an era that data volume is so large, data transmission is so speedy, data storage is so cheap, and data analysis is so advanced. Therefore, data science has become a new paradigm in the current era. According to the statement quoted by Wikipedia, data science is a "concept to unify statistics, data analysis, machine learning and their related methods" in order to "understand and analyze actual phenomena" with data (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_science for the original source). In order to provide students with an overview and hands-on practice of data science, we will present the many aspects of data science in this introductory course, and use computer software to explore various topics such as data storage, consolidation, cleaning, sampling, modeling, exploration, visualization, statistical

notes: *土木四和防災所合開,上限40人(研究所20人)

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 本課程透過個案分析，了解全球與台灣知名企業在顧客服務上獨特之處，個案所涵蓋領域包含服務業、製造業、飯店業、旅遊航空業、餐飲業等，透過討論在顧客關係管理上的重要議題如顧客體驗、抱怨管理、服務文化、服務創新等，並使同學能夠對於顧客關係管理在最佳實務上運作有進一步了解。
description.en: This course analyzes the cases to help students understand the factors of successful companies in customer relationship management. The selected cases cover different industries such as service industry, hotel industry, travel and airline industry, and restaurant industry. The course aims to synthesize popular issues such as customer experience, compliant management, service culture, service innovation and so on and provide the how best practices worked in the real world.

description.zh: 本課程旨於介紹基本細胞培養技術，細胞生物學及生化工程。並將此些技術沿用至高科技產業及應用－包括設計及操作細胞培養反應器，製程設計及最適化。目的在於提供細胞及組織適當之養份輸入及擴散。本課程亦針對疫苗及其他生物製品之最新之處理技術，ｃＧＭＰ規範及遠景做該括之介紹。課程安排如下：１．	細胞培養簡介２．	基本細胞培養介紹３．	細胞生物及生理學４．	概述細胞培養產物５．	細胞株篩選及發展６．	反應槽動力工程７．	細胞培養程序工程８．	微載體技術９．	下游純化技術１０．	個案一：疫苗生產１１．	個案二：單株抗體生產１２．	簡介ｃＧＭＰ規範
description.en: This course is aimed to give an introduction for students who are interested in state-of-the-art cell culture technology. This course also focuses on the fundamentals of cell biology and biochemical engineering. A review of the current development in cell biology and physiology will be introduced to students, and the course will allow students to understand the operation and design of cell culture reactors, and overall process design and optimization. Emphasis is given to new developments and strategies for the control of nutrient feeding and perfusion for both cell culture and tissue engineering. New processing technology and future prospects of vaccines and other biologicals and current good manufacturing practice (cGMP) guideline are also presented. The content of this course is listed below:1.	Cell culture introduction2.	Basic cell culture techniques3.	Cell biology and physiology4.	Overview of Cell-culture-derived products5.	Cell line selection and development6.	Kinetic

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

notes: 管理博班和工管所合開*

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

notes: 工管大四20碩班15合開/管理博班和工管所合開*

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.zh: 本課程主要分成三部分。第一部分介紹工業機器人的結構，分類和其工作空間等基礎。第二部分介紹機器人的端效器、語言指令及其控制系統和安全。最後再介紹機器人如何與系統相整合，以執行功能性的製造單元(或製造系統)。
description.en: This course basically is composed of 3 parts. First, configuration, classification and work cell of the industrial robots will be introduced. Secondary, end-of-tooling, programming & instruction, control system controller and safety is covered. Finally, the robot and system integration to execute a functional manufacturing cell (or system) will be provided.

notes: 管理博班和工管所合開*

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討供應鏈與物流管理之相關議題。物流管理為供應鏈管理重要之一環。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、物流管理、供應鏈管理之相關功能、供應鏈管理之績效衡量、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce essential topics regarding supply chain and logistic management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, logistic management, supply chain management functions, supply chain management performance evaluation, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

notes: 管理博班和工管所合開*

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

name.zh: 製造與工作環境之AR/VR實務
name.en: AR/VR Practice of Manufacturing and Workspace Design

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何把擴增實境(Augmented Reality)及虛擬實境(Virtual Reality)技術應用在製造業以及工作環境之實務設計。實務操作單元包含：人機互動系統實驗。
description.en: The goal of this course is to empower students in learning and applying the practical uses of AR (Augmented Reality) and VR (Virtual Reality) technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The practice sessions include: experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training and application of Unity, etc.

notes: 管理博班和工管所合開*【停開】

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路模式的分析與整數規劃問題相關的數學模式、演算法及相關應用，包含相關模式的觀念、方法、數理基礎與分析。網路模式部分包括基本圖學與網路流量最佳化相關的演算法；整數規劃部分包含旅行者問題、有效不等式、與分支定界演算法。
description.en: This course introduces the theory and characteristics of network and integer programming problems. In network models, basic graph theory along with network optimization algorithms is included to have a comprehensive understanding. Introduction to integer programming problems such as traveling salesman problems as well as detail study of valid inequalities and branch-and-bound method, including the concepts, techniques, mathematical analysis and justification. Emphasis is placed on the rigorous theoretical foundations that give rise to solution algorithms.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 限博士生修習，限15人，製科所和機電科所合開*

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流，因此國外廠商紛紛上網卡位，網路商業化已成為一股不可抵擋的趨勢。本課程中將介紹對電子商務作理論與實務上的探討。1. 電子商務與商業模式2. 電子商務策略發展3. B to C電子商務4. C to C電子商務5. B to B電子商務6. 無線網路7. 企業電子化8. 企業資源規劃9. 供應鏈管理10. 顧客關係管理11知識管理與e-Learning12. 網路行銷14. 網路廣告與關鍵字廣告15. 網路安全性
description.en: E-business (electronic business) is the conducting of business on the Internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners.The outline of electronic business is as following:1. Introduction to Electronic Commerce.2. Technology Infrastructure: The Internet and the World Wide Web.3. Selling on the Web: Revenue Models and Building a Web Presence.4. Marketing on the Web.5. Business-to-Business Online Strategies6. Online Auctions, Virtual Communities, and Web Portals.7. The Environment of Electronic Commerce: Legal, Ethical, and Tax Issues.8. Web Server Hardware and Software.9: Electronic Commerce Software.10. Electronic Commerce Security.11. Payment Systems for Electronic Commerce.12. Planning for Electronic Commerce

description.zh: 1.解析法 2.變分法 3.動差法 4.有限元素法 5.譜域分析法 6.傳輸線矩陣法
description.en: 1.Analytical Method 2.Variational Method 3.Moment Method 4.Finite 5.Spectral Domain Analysis 6.Transmission Line Matrix

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

name.zh: 自然語言處理與情感計算
name.en: Natural language processing and affective computing

description.zh: 未來的自然語言處理技術應該是能讓機器以人為本的角度來了解人類語言。尤其人類是富有感情的，所以，機器必須能理解與應對人類的情感。本課程內容將從心理語言學出發，探討、比較人和機器如何處理語言。尤其是人如何透過文字和語音來表達不同情緒，然後運用機器學習、深度學習和人本資料資料探勘等技術，進行語音與文本分析，偵測辨識實際人類語言中的情緒，進而培養如何讓人工智慧能夠更貼近使用者需要的洞察力與處理能力。
description.en: In future natural language processing technologies, machines should understand language from a human-oriented perspective. Especially given that human beings have emotions, machines must be able to understand and respond to human emotions.The content of this course will be based on psycholinguistics. We will first explore and compare how people and machines deal with language, especially in terms of how people express different emotions through words and voices. We will then apply machine learning, deep learning and human-centered information data mining techniques to detect emotions in real human language.

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程內容有:1.儀器裝置,應變計原理與使用方法.2.驗証簡支樑之彎曲理論.3.驗證馬克斯維爾反相定理.4.桁架試驗.5.剛架試驗.6.壓構材欴挫屈試驗.7.構材扭轉試驗.
description.en: Introduction: 1.Instrumentation. 2.Simple bending. 3.Maxwell's Reciprocal theorem. 4.Truss. 5.Rigid frame. 6.Buckling test. 7.Torsion test.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授同學一般工程專案管理之主要概念、內容包含專案管理組織架構，專案時程控管、專案範疇管理、專案整合管理、專案溝通管理、專案人力資源管理等理論知識，同時也包含了常用工程專案管理管控方法與技術機制介紹。本課程目標意在培養具備同學工程專案管理方法與技術，使應用於工程專案專案之設計、施工、及營運階段。
description.en: Project management in construction is increasingly important for management of construction projects recently. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for project management in construction. The course includes project schedule management, project scope management, project integration management, project communication, and project human resource management. The course allows students to enhance the abilities and techniques to handle the construction project management during the design, construction, and operation phase.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.
