description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

name.zh: 能源轉型與低碳社會建構

description.zh: 21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹能源轉型/節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。

The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the related digital technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Including High Dynamic Range Photography, Physically Based Rendering, Tone mapping, and Image Based Lighting. Intellectually, this course aims to explore the possibilities of utilizing the related technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging on design and research applications.

The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.zh: 循環經濟與高分子工業

description.zh: 循環經濟是一種與傳統線性經濟（開採-製造-丟棄）不同的產業經濟模式，循環經濟就像自然生態循環一樣，是封閉且循環的經濟系統，透過重新設計產品和商業模式，促進更好的能源與資源使用效率、消除廢棄物及避免污染自然環境。內容將包括發展及應用物質流分析及循環經濟的相關技術，先進材料的循環經濟議題及案例分析，不同高分子材料領域的循環經濟生態，及跨學科創造永續的解決辦法。
description.en: A circular economy is a regenerative system in which resource input and waste, emission, and energy leakage are minimised by slowing, closing, and narrowing material and energy loops. This can be achieved through long-lasting design, maintenance, repair, reuse, remanufacturing, refurbishing, and recycling. This is contrast to a linear economy which is a 'take, make, dispose' model of production. This course, further, contributes to the optimising systems rather than components, or the notion of ‘design for fit’. As a generic notion it draws from a number of more specific approaches including novel material, plastic, polymer, textile, and the cicular economy. Additional benefit to students is learning of Sustainable Development.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 本課程介紹腦機介面工程之原理及應用，包括腦科學基本知識、腦機介面系統基本架構、腦波訊號處理、以及在健康照護自動化及控制領域相關應用。本課程將安排各項實習，讓學生實際操作腦波儀進行實驗與基本腦波分析。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with basic knowledge of brain science, architecture of brain-computer interface, EEG signal processing, and applications in healthcare automation and control.

notes: 限10人/和感測學程合開，可抵孼生醫感測技術與系統

description.zh: 導論及AI之工業應用、類神經網路及專家系統搜尋法則、敘述邏輯、驗證、機器學習。
description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

notes: 研究所限20人/機械大三和機電所合開

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.基礎物理光學2.超音波簡介3.雷射超音波的生成4.雷射超音波的偵測5.刀鋒邊緣技術6.雙頻干涉儀7.費里裴洛干涉儀8.非線性晶體干涉儀9.雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用10.雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用11.雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
description.en: 1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.

notes: 機電所、機械博及外生合開

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解施工安全衛生的重要，熟悉有關知識及緊急措施，從而增加處變之因應能力。內容包括施工安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，風險評估與安全管理，施工安全和衛生設備，安全經費編列與執行，新穎的風險評估及安全管理方法與研究等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the students the concept of the importance of construction safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of construction safety, analysis of accidents, risk assessment and safety management, construction safety and facilities, safety outlay and implementation, current research and novel techniques for risk assessment and safety management and so on.

description.zh: 主要介紹結構陶瓷，生醫陶瓷，複合陶瓷等。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Structural Ceramics.

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用
description.en: 1. Introduction  2.Random vectors and their properties  3.Hypothesis testing   4. Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 擴增實境 (Augmented Reality, AR) 著重在與真實世界的結合，增強真實世界裡的資訊顯示與互動經驗，透過該產品，能夠輕而易舉地得到真實景物的資訊。本課程內容先介紹AR原理、技術發展與限制、可應用的展示平台、與其他技術搭配應用、各領域應用案例，如數位學習、醫療、即時翻譯、展示、遊戲與娛樂。
description.en: Augmented Reality (AR) concerns about the combination between real and virtual world. AR technology is to display information inside any objects or devices. The course will introduce AR principles, technology development and constraints, applicable display platform, combination with other technology, implication cases in any fields such as digital learning, medical care, instant translation, display, game and amusement.

notes: 請排進修部教室,修課上限30人

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

description.zh: 本課程探究文化保存的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現；同時透過國內外文化保存的實踐案例的分析與討論，思考未來文化保存的多元發展可能性。
description.en: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉智慧電網原理等相關知識。訓練學生具備運用智慧電網基礎、設計、分析與研發的能力。培養學生了解智慧電網與永續能源原理、觀念、背景、議題、應用與未來發展，實際瞭解智慧電網系統之運作。授課內容為：基本電力系統、智慧電網與電網運轉簡介、電網通訊、電網數據分析基礎、分散式電網與能源系統、智慧電網市場運轉
description.en: Introduction to the field of Smart Grid. The course will provide students with a working knowledge of fundamentals, design, analysis, and development of Smart Grid. This course will present and discuss principles, concepts, contexts, issues, applications and future developments of Smart grids and sustainable Energy integration. The course topics covered: 1.	Basics of Power Systems;2.	Introduction to smart grid and power grid operation;3.	Power grid communication and networking;4.	Elements of power networks and data analysis;5.	Elements of distributed energy resources (DER) and grid integration;6.	Economics and Market Operations.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 企業數位轉型專題研究
name.en: Research on Digital Transformation of Enterprises

description.zh: 數位時代的快速變遷使得許多高階管理者們對於企業應該如何轉型感到不確定。了解科技、商業模式、消費者行為等趨勢，才能使企業從數位環境中發現機會，定位未來企業的發展方向並尋求合適的方法進行變革，成功進行數位化轉型，將挑戰轉化為商機。本課程將針對企業數位轉型中相關議題如環境發展，數位策略，數位經營模式，製造業與服務業等各產業數位案例，及企業數位化成熟度等作研析。
description.en: The rapid changes in the digital age have made many high-level managers uncertain about how companies should transform. Understanding trends in technology, business models, consumer behavior, etc., enables companies to identify opportunities in the digital environment, position the future direction of the enterprise and seek appropriate ways to transform, successfully transform digitally, and turn challenges into business opportunities.This course will focus on the related issues such as environmental development, digital strategy, digital business model, manufacturing and service industries, and the digital maturity of enterprises.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 經管三、四、經管所和創創專區合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

name.en: Special Topic on plastic metal working

description.zh: 塑性加工概論、金屬變形機構、冷作加工、鈑金成形理論、塑性加工產品檢驗、塑性加工機械與模具、個案討論。
description.en: Introduction to plastic metal working, Metal forming mechanism and mechanics, Cold working, Sheet metal forming, Product inspection and quality control, Metal forming machines and tools, and Case study.

notes: 製科所、機電博班和外生班合開,限30人

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 使用進修部排課教室,限30人,日職合開

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種近代材料分析技術，特別著重於表面分析上。修課後，學生將了解各種技術的基本原理並可選擇適當的方法去作樣品影像表面以及材料分析，同時可比較各方法優缺以及其限制。課程討論之技術主要基於樣品與光子或電子之間的交互作用。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce modern techniques for materials characterization, especially on surface characterization. After completing the course, the students would be able to understand and choose appropriate instrumentation for imaging and materials analysis by comparing the performance and limitation of different methods for a given situation. Techniques involved in photon and electron interactions with matter would be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程為任職於英語教育之教師所設計，主旨在於分析數位教材於英語教學中的角色。藉由電腦/科技輔助語言教學、電腦媒介溝通、以及線上教學相關理論、研究與應用的研討來瞭解數位教材如何輔助英語學習。因應數位教材與學習者特性所採用之評量、評估、以及施測方法亦將是本課程重點。
description.en: This course is designed for in-service English teachers to analyze the pedagogical role of electronic courseware in the language classroom. Theories and studies of CALL (computer-assisted language learning), TELL (technology-enhanced language learning), CMC (computer-mediated communication), and online learning will be discussed to understand the utilization of electronic courseware in assisting English learning. Assessment, evaluation, and testing measurements in responding to electronic courseware and to learner characteristics will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

notes: 電腦教室，預估20人，禮拜二 ABC節

description.zh: 本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
description.en: The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

notes: 限25人/製科所必選課程之一*

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1.精實製造系統概論 2.價值溪流分析 3.快速更換 4.使用點 5.源流品質 6.團隊 7.全員生產維護 8.後拉式/及時/看板生產系統 9.單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

notes: 限25人/製科所必選之一/機電、製科、機械博及外生

description.zh: 浪漫主義通常被視為是革命時期中的一個段落。浪漫主義之興起與美國獨立戰爭、法國大革命，以及工業革命發生於同一時期。浪漫主義者同時透過改變對於性別、種族、及階級之觀點來認識並重新定義文學中的自我。課程將引導學生閱讀各類在此種改變的氛圍下所出版的文學作品，並選讀早期的著作，後提供學生對照文本輔助研讀
description.en: Romanticism is often hailed as a period of revolution.  Coinciding with the American Revolution, the French Revolution, and the Industrial Revolution, the Romantics were also recognizing and redefining the literary self through changing perspectives on gender, race, and class.  We will read a survey of literature produced in this atmosphere of change as well as writings from earlier periods selected to provide contrast for our inquiry.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 限20人/機電、製科、機電博及機械外生合開/3D列印

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

notes: 能源所、自動外生和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

name.zh: 光纖有線電視固網信號傳輸系統
name.en: Fiber system for CATV, fixed network

description.zh: (1)光纖電纜混合系統(2)個人通訊系統(3)光纖電話系統(4)光纖電纜混合電話系統(5)有線電視固網DWDM系統(6)信號間非線性作用(7)類比數位通道的干擾(8)脈衝雜訊
description.en: (1)Wire Access in HFC Systems (2)Personal Communication Systems (3)Optical Fiber-Based Phone Systems (4)Hybrid-Fiber-Coax BAsed Phone Systems (5)A Hybrid DWDM System for CATC & Fixed Network System (6)Nonlinear Interaction Between Optical Signaals (7)Crosstalk From Analoy Channels to Digital Channel (8)Clipping-Induced Impulse Noise

name.zh: 高科技產業專利佈局與專利策略
name.en: Patent Strategy and Patent Portfolio of High Technology Industry

description.zh: 高科技產業的專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出數十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利申請策略開始，告訴同學專利申請上常見的錯誤，如何以較低的成本取得、維護我國專利，並利用我國專利進行全球專利佈局。
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the high-tech industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent filing strategy, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光的偏振 (3)異向介質中的光波傳播特性 (4)Jones矩陣法 (5)液晶顯示器(6)液晶顯示器特性 (7)液晶空間光調制器 (8)液晶顯示器應用
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Polarization representation (3) Optical wave in Anistropic media (4) Jones Matrix Method (5) Liquid crystal displays (6) Properties of liquid crystal display (7) Liquid Crystal Spatial Light Modulators (8) Applications

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

name.en: The introduction and practical works of cultural and creative industry

description.zh: 本課程希望透過媒體與文創相關產業主管之帶領，訓練修課學生投入文創工作時所具備之眼界與執行力，並利用上學期所學，鼓勵學生試圖設計屬於自己的文創產品概念。除了產業之介紹與培訓課程，我們也注重同學對於新媒體與移動裝置之掌握與運用，建立在數位時代踏入文創產業之不可或缺之素養。
description.en: The students in the class will be conducted and taught by the managers of media, cultural and creative industry to learn the insight and execution in the relative works. We will ask the students to design their own prototypes of cultural and creative product based on the concept and vision they’ve learned last semester. Except the introduction and lecture of the industry, we will also focus on students’ ability of coordination with new media or mobile devices, which are the important accomplishments for cultural and creative industries in digital era.

The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 行銷活動是管理業務的核心，它提供了與客戶進行交互的重點，並且是有關客戶、競爭對手和整個業務環境的情報來源。行銷管理關注公司與客戶的長期關係，以及短期銷售活動。成功的行銷人員可以為客戶創造並提供卓越的價值。本課程目的是：（1）使學生了解行銷作為一個管理挑戰在公司中的作用和重要性；（2）從概念、理論、實踐和分析的角度使學生熟悉與行銷相關的知識；（3）幫助學生發展組織有效的行銷策略和活動所需的技能；（4）使學生提高團隊合作解決問題、案例和項目的能力。
description.en: Marketing activity is at the core of managing a business; it provides the focus for interfacing with customers and is the source of intelligence about customers, competitors, and the business environment in general. Marketing management is concerned with the long-term relationships of the firm with its customers as well as short-term sales activity. The purpose of this course is to (1) familiarize students with marketing related knowledge from conceptual, theoretical, practical and analytical perspectives; (2) provide students an understanding of the role and importance of marketing in a firm as a managerial challenge; (3) help students developing skills required in organizing effective marketing strategies and activities; and (4) enable students to improve the ability of working out problems, cases and projects as a team.

description.en: This course covers the fundamentals of chemical sensors and biosensors based on chemical modifications, electrochemistry, spectroscopy, semiconductor technologies, and physiological electrical signal measurements. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

name.zh: 動畫電影中的中世紀文化
name.en: Knights, Monsters, Castles and Other Things Medieval in Hollywood Movies and Japanese Anime

description.zh: 廣義上，中世紀時期可被定義為由羅馬帝國的衰落開始並持續至十五世紀文藝復興。中古世紀被文藝復興時期的人們視為一段缺乏啟蒙、知識及現代化的黑暗時期。然而許多黑暗時期的故事--如亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主—卻一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: The Medieval Period can be defined broadly as that period from the fall of the Roman Empire to the 15th century Italian Renaissance – a dark time, if one is to believe the men of the Renaissance, in need of light, knowledge, modernization. Yet the stories of these dark ages – of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions. Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

name.zh: 組織理論與市場創新策略
name.en: Organization Theory and Market Creative Strategy

description.zh: 本課程探討組織重要理論與市場創新策略，課程中以組織理論與市場創新策略來了解企業管理的關鍵議題。課程內容包含企業環境、企業權力、企業政治、組織文化、市場策略、創新策略、市場策略創新策略。企業經理人學習後，面對多變的市場環境中，可以做出最佳的市場決策。
description.en: The program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of organization theory and market creative strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business. The topics covered in this course include: business environment, business power, business polices, organization culture , and market strategy, creative strategy, market creative strategy. After taking the class, under the changeable market environment, students should be able to make the best decisions of market.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 1. 授課目的：  現代都市計劃及都市設計作業內容中，必須考量都市永續環境生態之議題。本課程之目的即在於傳述都市之生態概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容及其行政程序，以培養學生永續都市及敷地計畫規劃能力。2. 授課內容：  由基本永續都市中，思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。綠建築、永續都市之內容。引介各項生態技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而論證其都計管制規範。3. 作業練習：  本學期藉由實驗操作、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用規劃能力，以利學生認識都市生態技術及都計行政作業之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位規劃思辯能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the environmental planning, green buildings and sustainable urban design. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹勞資關係各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種勞動法規應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解勞動法規的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the Industrial Relations each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of Labor Laws, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial Relations main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 風工程是一個跨領域的學科，屬於研究所課程，適合已有良好工程力學以及流體力學基礎的學生選修。然而為了推廣我國工程師及土木系大學生了解此門學問，本課程設計為大四及研究所學生選修的先導型課程。本課程內容涵蓋大氣邊界層、鈍體空氣動力學以及空氣彈力學的基礎知識，進而闡述建築物耐風設計以及橋梁耐風設計的概念，配合我國以及國際上常用之耐風設計規範作為解說及練習，輔助學生對於風工程有一定的認識。其他如空氣污染擴散、通風節能減熱、計算流體力學應用等與風相關的主題，亦在本課程提出概略性的介紹以及發展現況。
description.en: Wind Engineering is a cross-disciplinary subject that belongs to the institute course and is suitable for students who have a good background in engineering mechanics and fluid mechanics. However, in order to promote the knowledge of Wind Engineering to engineers and civil engineering students, this course is designed as the precursor courses selected by seniors and graduate students. This course covers the basic knowledge of atmospheric boundary layer, bluff body aerodynamics and air-elasticity, and then expounds the wind-resistant design of buildings and the concept of wind-resistant design of bridges. It is used as an explanation and practice with the wind-resistant design codes commonly used internationally. Students have a certain understanding of wind engineering. Other wind-related topics such as air pollution diffusion, ventilation energy conservation and heat reduction, computational fluid dynamics applications, etc., also provide a brief introduction and development status in

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (II)

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in class.

notes: 電機大四和智財所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三、四與職建都所合開

description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 簡介,層狀認知網路,倒傳遞網路,學習向量量化網路,自組織映射網路,Hopfisld網路，退火神經網路,應用與實做。
description.en: introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neuralnetwork, applications implements.

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹深度強化學習的理論基礎，了解AlphaGo背後的原理，和目前學術界最新的研究成果。並教導學員使用最新的Python深度學習套件來訓練機器自主學習。課程內容包括：1.強化學習簡介2.有限馬可夫決策過程3.蒙地卡羅法4.時序差分學習5.Deep Q-Networks (DQN)6.OpenAI Gym7.Actor-Critic方法 (A3C & A2C)8.信賴區域(Trust Regions) – TRPO, PPO與ACKTR
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce fundamental theories behind deep reinfocement learning and summarize the state-of-the-art research results. We will also teach how to use Python deep learning framework (TensorFlow & PyTorch) and demonstrate how to train software agents to learn different tasks. The content includes:1.Introduction to Reinforcement Learning2.Finite Markov Decision Processes3.Monte Carlo Methods4.Temporal-Difference Learning5.Deep Q-Networks (DQN)6.OpenAI Gym7.Actor-Critic Methods (A3C & A2C)8.Trust Regions – TRPO, PPO and ACKTR

notes: 電子四甲乙、電子所和電資外生班合開,限35人

description.zh: 本課程能夠讓修課學生靈活的運用各種大數據探勘與分析演算法、社群文字探勘及機器學習演算法等技術，分析各項金融資料。透過實際金融數據分析案例及實務資料操做，補強資訊背景學生之金融產業知識，並讓修課同學了解資訊科技於金融資料分析之實務應用，以培育業界金融科技人才。課程內容以模組的方式進行，包括：「數據分析」、「機器學習」以及「金融大數據實務」。課程也將擷取網路中的開放財經數據，進行金融資料之預處理、分析及預測結果之驗證，協助修課學生建構高預測能力及穩定性之數據探勘模型。
description.en: This course teaches students to use various techniques of big data mining and analysis algorithms, text mining of social media, and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data. In this course, by case study and open software operation (such as R ), we will strengthen the financial knowledge of information background students. Also, the students can understand how to select and well organize various information technologies (particular the data analysis technique) to analyze financial data. The course is organized in modules, including "Data Analysis", "Machine Learning" and "Big Data Practice for Financial Data analysis." The course will also teach students to collect open financial data from the Internet, and experience the KDD process, including: data pre-processing and data analysis, to establish a prediction model with high forecasting ability and stability.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹計算智慧的相關知識、技術與其優點，旨在教授學生如何運用計算智慧技術解決實際問題。課程目標有二：(1)相關的計算智慧技術與其運作原理，包含：遺傳演算法、多目標遺傳演算法等；(2)相關的應用案例討論。透過此課程，學生將可套用計算智慧技術於各種最佳化問題。
description.en: This course will introduce related knowledge, techniques and merits of computational intelligence for providing useful ways for students to solve the real application problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related computational intelligence techniques and how it work, including genetic algorithms, multi-objective genetic algorithm, etc; (2) related applications and discussions. Through this course, students can learn how to apply computational intelligence on different optimization problems.

notes: 陳俊豪老師(108-2新聘教師)/四甲、碩班合開,限30人

description.zh: 本課程將聚焦在商業智慧的重要性。商業智慧泛指應用資料倉儲設計與工具，協助企業從大量業務資料中尋找重要的資訊與知識，協助管理者建立決策。也會介紹數位金融最新趨勢，創新服務與最佳範例。
description.en: This course will focus on the business intelligent. Business intelligent is information systems that apply information technology to assist management in decision-making and strategic-planning. This course will introduce about the latest trends, innovations and best practices in digital finance.

notes: 三甲乙、四甲及碩班合開,限14人

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

description.zh: 本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2)相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
description.en: In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開,限50人

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

notes: 電子三、四甲乙和電子所合開

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括1.合併的動機與理論介紹，2.購併的型態與策略規畫，3.公司購併時的法律規畫4.美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5.美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討6.金融控股公司相關議題，7.合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

description.zh: 本課程介紹人工智慧的基本概念與發展，並激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、人工智慧的製造業應用、人工智慧的服務業應用。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of artifi-cial intelligence and to inspire students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industrial applications of artificial intelligence, and services ap-plications of artificial intelligence.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain manage-ment9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.zh: 智慧機器人與AR/VR 應用專題
name.en: Special Topics in Intelligent Robot and AR/VR Applications

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹智慧機器人及AR/VR之知識領域相關議題，關於智慧機器人部分，主要包括：機器人學原理與分析方法、機器人的設計分析製造與應用、智慧機器人的歷史與未來的發展、機器視覺之原理與應用等；關於AR/VR部分，此概論課程將介紹AR/VR相關技術於現今智慧製造與服務業之應用，並展示AR/VR於不同工作環境設計之應用實例，如VR/AR軟硬體操作及體驗、各式追蹤系統介紹等等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of intelligent robot and applications of aug-mented reality and virtual reality. The course is designed to provide the fol-lowings topics: 1. fundamentals of robotics and analytical methodologies, 2. design, manufacturing, and applications of robots, 3. the history and the fu-ture of intelligent robot, 4. fundamentals and practical applications of ma-chine vision, 5. overview about AR and VR technology applied in smart manufacturing and service industries, 6. applications and examples of AR/VR, e.g. software and hardware design and operation, various tracking systems, etc.

name.zh: 資金與風險管理理論與實務
name.en: Money and Risk Management: Theory and Practice

description.zh: 本課程介紹投資決策上資金與風險管理議題，課程前半以資金管理理論為主，從傳統賭局角度出發，延伸到金融交易實務，理論面探討到實務操作面，並配合程式語言模擬回測進行探討。後半段課程講述金融商品的設計原理，並透過拆解商品來分析該商品的投資前風險，並討論如何衡量並控制其投資後的風險
description.en: This course introduces the issues of money and risk management in investment decision-making. The first half of the course focuses on the theory of money management. From the perspective of traditional gambling, it extends to the practice of financial trading. We discuss from the theoretically to the practical operation side and cooperates with programming language by simulation and backtesting.The second part of this course will focus on the principle of financial engineering. By anatomizing the financial products, we can analyze their risk prior to investments and discuss how to measure and  manage the investment risk after the investments.

name.zh: 智慧生活與使用者經驗

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人因觀點，探討智慧生活之產品與服務。授課主要以個案探討方式，使學生了解人因相關概念與方法，特別是使用者經驗與人本設計，以及如何將這些概念與方法導入組織中，並應用於相關產品與服務之開發與設計。
description.en: This course focuses on the products and services of smart living from the perspective of human factors. Courses will generally be taught through case studies. Students will learn the concepts and methods related to human factors, especially user experience and user centered design, and how these concepts and methods to be introduced into organizations and applied to the development and design of those products and services.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二107級必修，科研國際會議廳 *

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 以消費者為重心已蔚為目前市場行銷的重要潮流。了解消費者決策過程也成為行銷領域研究的主流。一般而言，消費者的購買決策制定過程決定產品與服務的購買結果，主要包括五個階段：(1)問題察覺、(2)資訊搜尋、(3)方案評估、(4)購買選擇、(5)購後過程。消費者的購買決策制定過程深受各種不同因素之影響。這些因素大抵可分為兩個類別：個人內在因素（知覺、資訊處理與學習、記憶、知識、動機與涉入、價值觀、自我與人格、生活形態、態度、與情感等）與環境因素（行銷環境、購買情境、文化、團體與人際影響、家庭等）。本課程主要目標在使學生了解消費者決策過程與相關心理學、社會學、行銷學與廣告學原理之間的關係。課程以哈佛式個案討論為主。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，我們已經處於大數據時代，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與分析大數據、如何更進一步從大數據分析發展市場行銷與顧客關係管理策略，大數據各種案例實務探討等。
description.en: With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store these big data and how to mine useful knowledge from big data have become the popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store big data, and how to develop marketing and customer relationship management strategies thru big data analysis, and various big data practices and case studies.

description.zh: NONE
description.en: NONE

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題(二)
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence(II)

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出(MIMO)傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下:1.無線通道模型2.多樣性3.通道容量4.MIMO I: 空間多工5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構6.MIMO III:多樣性與多工間取捨7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略:案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

notes: 限15人/經管三、經管所和創創專區合開

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略:案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。

Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.
